priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire SDS Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C111350

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SDS Test Code Terminology

name: Sheehan Disability Scale Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SDS Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Sheehan Disability Scale Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your work/school work.
Sheehan Disability Scale - I have not worked/studied at all during the past week for reasons unrelated to the disorder.
terms.preferredTerm: SDS - Not Worked/Studied in Past Week for Reason Unrelated to Disorder

terms.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your social life/leisure activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SDS - Symptoms Disrupted Social Life/Leisure Activities

terms.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your family life/home responsibilities.
terms.preferredTerm: SDS - Symptoms Disrupted Family Life/Home Responsibilities

terms.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - On how many days in the last week did your symptoms cause you to miss school or work or leave you unable to carry out your normal daily responsibilities?

Sheehan Disability Scale - On how many days in the last week did you feel so impaired by your symptoms, that even though you went to school or work or had other daily responsibilities, your productivity was reduced?
